page.title: 01GENERAL DESCRIPTION
page.content: This is a sparsely populated{rural} area covered mainly by{farmland}.Most of the fields grow forage crops for {dairy cattle}. There are{three small villages}some hamlets and{isolated houses}and{farms} most houses are made of local stone .The local stone is{serpentine and{blue elvan}.Some of the very new houses are being faced in local stone to make them blend in with the countryside .There is only one A class road one B class road and all other roads are narrow winding and unclassifed .None of them carry any heavey traffic except in the summer months when the{tourists}come .Most of the d.block is tree less but there are {plantations.Quarrying}is carried out in the area where there are some local legends,interesting{antiquites}and many{rare plants}to be seen.
